cause.description:
this cause is for helping the elders in 3rd world countries have a more pleasent and dignified last days since the economy is not good in 3rd world countries most elders spend a harsh and un pleasent last days, let us remember that the world reached its point of today cause this elders where young once, and worked for us and others and we owe them our respect and support.
1. Understanding
2. Support
3. Love
cause.mission: To make the last Days count
cause.name: Help the Elders
